name: FireFighterSun_Trapped
description:
This is for the 2021 Epic Mega jam: Running out of space

This is my first time making an unreal game so I was focused on learning instead of making original assets/making game look more then like the starter assets...Therefore, I understand if I get 0 points (or event negative points!!!)

Hopefully I can make a better game in next years game jam!

References used:

DevAddict "Let's Make a Game in 2 HOURS in Unreal Engine 4 [Top-Down Shooter]"

Assets:

Epic Games MarketPlace "Paragon: Lt. Belica"

Epic Games MarketPlace "Paragon: Minions"
